channel.title: Project sticky v2 - custom donar zone/pvp armours/working godswords and more
channel.description:
Hi
back a few weeks ago i released my very first source.... well after looking at it and seeing a few little things i missed out i decided to go fix them for you guys :) i really didnt do too mutch in v2 but i did edit basic things that new comers wouldnt be able to fix so my source id rate 5/10 for new coders (you can either edit r you carnt )
my server still has a few outstanding issues these are things that need fixing fire making needs enabling fishing needs fixing god wars needs finishing make buy20 actually give 20 and not 1
what does this server have? *full pvp armour *spirit shields *god swords *working skill cape emotes *working pest control *fully working barrows *easy drop system
pictures [IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/1-2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/2-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/3-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/5-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/9.jpg[/img]
download *packaged* http://uppit.com/z88rnlfe1iks/project_v2.rar
================ to change ip go into client folder then into the folder named java and open gui.java and client.java and change 127.0.0.1 to your no-ip ================

item.title: Project sticky v2 - custom donar zone/pvp armours/working godswords and more
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

If it doesn’t it takes about 1 minute to make it

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ipban") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(6); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Connection.addIpToBanList(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); Connection.addIpToFile(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); c.sendMessage("You have IP banned the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" with the host: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } }
That’s just ::ipban Ill post the other two soon

Read full topic
